name: 100 Crystal Ripples
description: (1080x1080, 60fps, 20.8s) If bought, contact me if you want the 5000x5000 version (407 MB). This artwork consists of 100 unique "crystal ripples". When creating this, I interpreted it as a cave ceiling sending a ripple of information throughout the cave, as if the cave is alive. Created by Alex Radomski (https://alexradomski.com). Twitter: @radomski_alex. Instagram: @alexradomski.
